text:
@realDonaldTrump 120,000 American lives have been lost.

43 million unemployed.

47 million using food banks.

There is no federal Covid-19 strategy.

The protests are growing.

And @realDonaldTrump continues to deny and deflect, failing the people he was elected to serve.
